tool.name: SAGA.shapes_polygons.15
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayA False isArrayB False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.shapes_polygons.15 A $A B $B SPLIT $SPLIT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: A
param.label: Layer A
param.help: Layer A The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: B
param.label: Layer B
param.help: Layer B The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: SPLIT
param.label: Split Parts
param.help: Set true if you want multipart polygons to become separate polygons.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: Calculates the geometric difference of the overlayed polygon layers, i.e. layer A less layer B. Sometimes referred to as 'Erase' command.<br/>Uses the free and open source software library <b>Clipper</b> created by Angus Johnson.<br/><a target="_blank" href="http://www.angusj.com/delphi/clipper.php">Clipper Homepage</a><br/><a target="_blank" href="http://sourceforge.net/projects/polyclipping/">Clipper at SourceForge</a><br/>
